metadata.title: CVE-2024-48933 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in LemonLDAP::NG before 2.19.3allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML into thelogin page via a username if userControl has been set to a non-defaultvalue that allows special HTML characters.

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
